name: Fatal
Bleed
note:
<Custom Apply Effect>
   target.removeState(5)
   target.removeState(6)
   target.removeState(7)
   target.removeState(8)
   target.removeState(9)
   target.removeState(10)
   target.removeState(11)
   target.removeState(13)
var stateId = 4;

switch (true) {
    case $gameSwitches.value(70):  // If Switch #70 is ON
        $dataStates[stateId].iconIndex = 1;  // Set Icon for Switch #70 (Enhanced Bleed Icon 50)
        break;
    case $gameSwitches.value(71):  // If Switch #71 is ON
        $dataStates[stateId].iconIndex = 1;  // Set Icon for Switch #71 (Bleed Icon 51)
        break;
    case $gameSwitches.value(72):  // If Switch #72 is ON
        $dataStates[stateId].iconIndex = 1;  // Set Icon for Switch #72 (Bleed Icon 52)
        break;
    case $gameSwitches.value(73):  // If Switch #73 is ON
        $dataStates[stateId].iconIndex = 1;  // Set Icon for Switch #73 (Bleed Icon 53)
        break;
    default:  // If none of the switches are ON, use default icon
        $dataStates[stateId].iconIndex = 1;  // Default Basic Bleed Icon (icon 40)
        break;
}
  </Custom Apply Effect>

name: inBattle
note:
<Category: Bypass Death Removal>
<Custom Apply Effect>
// Check if user is an actor.
if (user.isActor()) {
  // Archive the previous settings.

  user._prevFaceName = user._faceName;
    var faceIndex = 0;
  // Check if the actor ID is 1.
  if (user.actorId() === 1) {

    if (user.hp>0){
    // The filename of the face graphic without the file extension.
    var faceName = 'TintanysBattle';
    }else{
    var faceName = 'TintanysDead';    
    }

  // Check if the actor ID is 2.
  } else if (user.actorId() === 2) {

    if (user.hp>0){
    // The filename of the face graphic without the file extension.
    var faceName = 'SisiBattle';
    }else{
    var faceName = 'SisiDead';    
    }

  // Check if the actor ID is 3.
  } else if (user.actorId() === 3) {

    if (user.hp>0){
    // The filename of the face graphic without the file extension.
    var faceName = 'playerBattle';
    }else{
    var faceName = 'playerDead';    
    }
  } else {

    if (user.hp>0){
    // The filename of the face graphic without the file extension.
    var faceName = 'playerBattle';
    }else{
    var faceName = 'playerDead';    
    }


  }
  // Changes the face image to the setting applied from above.
  user.setFaceImage(faceName, faceIndex);
  // Refreshes the user's appearance.
  user.refresh();
}
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom re Effect>
// Check if user is an actor.
if (user.isActor()) {
  // Archive the previous settings.

  user._prevFaceName = user._prevFaceName || user._faceName;
    var faceIndex = 0;
  // Check if the actor ID is 1.
  if (user.actorId() === 1) {

    if (user.hp>0){
    // The filename of the face graphic without the file extension.
    var faceName = 'TintanysBattle';
    }else{
    var faceName = 'TintanysDead';    
    }

  // Check if the actor ID is 2.
  } else if (user.actorId() === 2) {

    if (user.hp>0){
    // The filename of the face graphic without the file extension.
    var faceName = 'SisiBattle';
    }else{
    var faceName = 'SisiDead';    
    }

  // Check if the actor ID is 3.
  } else if (user.actorId() === 3) {

    if (user.hp>0){
    // The filename of the face graphic without the file extension.
    var faceName = 'playerBattle';
    }else{
    var faceName = 'playerDead';    
    }
  } else {

    if (user.hp>0){
    // The filename of the face graphic without the file extension.
    var faceName = 'playerBattle';
    }else{
    var faceName = 'playerDead';    
    }


  }
  // Changes the face image to the setting applied from above.
  user.setFaceImage(faceName, faceIndex);
  // Refreshes the user's appearance.
  user.refresh();
}
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Remove Effect>
// Retrieve archived settings.

var faceName = user._prevFaceName;
var faceIndex = 0;

// Changes the face image to the archived setting.
user.setFaceImage(faceName, faceIndex);


// Refreshes the user's appearance.

user.refresh();
</Custom Remove Effect>

name: Fatal Injure
note:
<Custom Remove Effect>
if (user.isActor()) {

  // Check if the actor ID is 1.
  if (user.actorId() === 1) {
    $gameSwitches.setValue(164, false);    
  // Check if the actor ID is 2.
  } else if (user.actorId() === 2) {
    $gameSwitches.setValue(165, false);
   
  // Check if the actor ID is 3.
  } else if (user.actorId() === 3) {
    $gameSwitches.setValue(166, false);  
  } else {
    $gameSwitches.setValue(166, false);   
    }
  }
</Custom Remove Effect>
